Venice is a beautiful, unique and special city and this is a great hotel to use as a base. I'd definately go back and be more than happy to stay in this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and friendly service”
Reviews.Author: ambermaine
Reviews.Content: Have just returned from a three night stay in Venice. This hotel has such a convenient location - right on the Grand Canal and steps from the vaporetto stop. We specifically requested a twin room, and ended up with a really nice room, sadly not overlooking the canal but the garden. It was very quiet at night, and spotlessly clean. Breakfast was good and the staff very friendly and helpful. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Our second trip to Venice. Hotel Manin is in a fabulous location, on the Grand Canal. We got a great deal on hotels.com. Friendly service; spotlessly clean rooms. Would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Practically perfect in every way.”
Reviews.Author: wee1
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 nights in the spring and were blessed with good weather. The hotel was beautifully decorated - very sumptuous. Although our room was very small with no view, we were happy with it because of the reasonable price and fantastic location. Lovely breakfast eaten out in the garden/terrace while people watching (a waterbus stop right by the hotel - lots of coming and going, but not noisy at all!) Staff very friendly and helpful. Only negative point to make was that it was sometimes difficult to find when wondering the narrow streets. But that's all part of the fun and Venice charm. Loved Venice and would stay at the Manin again.

Reviews.Title: “perfect small hotel”
Reviews.Author: wendyh
Reviews.Content: As my birthday is a week beffore Christmas my husband and l decided a short break to Venice would be lovely present. We had a two night stay at the Manin, even though our room was very cosy (!!!) we had a very large balcony which had stunning views over the Grand Canal and the Rialto Bridge, had it not been so cold we would of enjoyed our views even more from this balcony. The hotel staff were excellent and made you feel very welcome. The breakfast room was like being in a stately home waiting room and the breakfast served was far better than what we expected ( also hot food, bacon and scrambled eggs. As the hotel is right on the canal with a waterbus stop just outside you are in an superb location for all the major attractions. Must visit Murano and Burano Islands both quite different but well worth the boat trip across. Would definitely go back to Venice and stay at the Hotel Manin again.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Manin, great people, great service!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at Hotel Manin on our honeymoon last Christmas! I know a little late, but for all those soon to be newlyweds this is a great place to stay and very reasonable price. It was an adventure finding the hotel, but once you found it, not a problem. There is also a water bus that drops you off at front. It might have been that we were newlyweds, but the staff greeted and took care of us with a smile! Every evening we were welcomed to chocolate and cute stationary notes by our bedside table, adding more romance to our experience. The breakfast was grand: Coffee, juices, fruits, pastries, sweets were a very nice touch around the holidays. Venice is just beautiful and this hotel really helped us enjoy this trip very much. The location is perfect and very close to St. Mark's Square, Doge's Palace (Palazzo Ducale). We saw a great though twisted Salvador Dali exhibit at the The Palazzo Grassi for any art fans. The architecture of this city is something to see. From seeing skyscrapers in Chicago to seeing exquisite Cathedrals, Churches and Palaces is just surreal. Truly one of the most romantic cities in the world. Some might say its overpriced but you can get away with buying dinner at small cafes with a panini. Take your time, enjoy the expressos and house wines. Finally, discover the places where the locals are and you will get a true grasp of the essence of this old historic city.

HotelInfo.Name: NH Manin Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Corte dell'Albero 3878 A | San Marco, 30124 Venice, Italy
